title: Growth potion

properties.value: The growth potion is an item obtained during the 2018 Easter event. It is obtained by speaking to Malignius Mortifer after bringing him some burnt meat, garlic, and a cabbage taken from the courtyard of Draynor Manor. Chocco needs it to complete his plan to create a giant easter egg, thereby saving easter.

content:
Growth potion was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Growth potion

Item IDhist22347

The growth potion is an item obtained during the 2018 Easter event. It is obtained by speaking to Malignius Mortifer after bringing him some burnt meat, garlic, and a cabbage taken from the courtyard of Draynor Manor. Chocco needs it to complete his plan to create a giant easter egg, thereby saving easter.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 April 2018
(update)
  • The item was graphically updated with the removal of the 2018 Easter event.
  • The item was renamed from "Growth potion" to "Null".
